What is obsidian? Obsidian is a note taking app with a different approach to apps like Notion. It uses links and backlinks to create relations between concepts and notes, letting the knowledge grow by his own and create structures between topics

item.title: Productivity with Obsidian
item.description: Sat (23)-07-2022-18:59 Status: #idea Tags: [[productivity]] [[second brain]] Productivity with Obsidian Why obsidian? Obsidian is a great tool to use as it lets you increase your knowledge incrementally with a minimum set-up and implementing a basic [[Zettelkasten Methodology]] we can create a great note-taking system
